title: Spacious and beautiful. Consider your new 3 bed / 2 bath found!
map_address: 4150 NW 34th St near State Road seven /Oakland
posting_body: ['3 Bedroom  2 Bathroom | 1254 sq ft | $1300/Month', 'St. Croix Apartments', '4150 NW 34th St', 'Lauderdale Lakes, FL 33319', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Welcome home to St. Croix Apartments, providing quality and convenience in Lauderdale Lakes.', 'Our roomy one, two and three bedroom distinct floor plans offer well appointed features along with endless recreational amenities to enjoy, truly enrich your days with a relaxing and fulfilling lifestyle.', 'Our apartments include a fully equipped kitchen, walk in closets and washer dryer hook up.', 'Meet your neighbors at our community clubhouse, relax around the pool or enjoy a workout in our state of the art fitness center.', 'Our apartments offer comfort and value with friendly resident service.', 'Visit us today.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Brushed Nickel Hardware', '● Central Air-conditioning', '● Electronic Keyless Apartment Entry', '● Garbage Disposal', '● Generous Cabinet Space', '● Oak Cabinetry', '● Screened Patio/Balcony', '● Spacious Floor Plans', '● Vertical Blinds', '● Washer/Dryer Rental', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● Clubhouse', '● Computer Lab', '● Covered Parking', '● Elevator Building', '● Guest Parking', '● Mature Landscaping', '● On-site Parking', '● Playground', '● Se habla Espanol', '● Sundeck', '● 24-hour Emergency Maintenance', "● Children's Playground", '● Laundry Facility(s)', '● Maintenance On-Site', '● Mid-rise Community', '● Property Manager On-Site', '● Smoke-free Community', '● Sparkling Pool Oasis', '● Well-appointed Clubhouse', '● Wi-Fi in Clubhouse', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 12-Month', 'Pets: No pets allowed;', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '112E080C39414AB']
